content: this eyelet purse is an easy beginner-friendly crochet bag pattern only basic stitches and one skein of cotton yarn are used to make this adorable boho purse detailed instructions and photos will walk you through every step featuring an eyelet design and crossbody strap you ll be rocking this purse with everything from jeans to your favorite date night dress it s large enough to fit your phone a thin wallet and your keys /pattern details the final clutch is 16 cm 6 ½ wide and 12 cm 4 ¾ high beginner pattern yes really minimal seaming only basic stitches single_crochet double_crochet and chain stitch us crochet notations illustrated step-by-step photos /materials 4 5 mm / us 7 crochet hook 1 100g skein 170 m / 186 yards of worsted weight cotton yarn pictures show lion brand 24/7 cotton in jeans color tapestry needle t-pins for blocking 1 butterfly or other button
